snippet: After Twitter imposed stricter rules for third-party apps on Thursday, engineers and developers picked up their pitchforks and took to Twitter and blogs to decry what some likened to a "bait and switch."
abstract: After Twitter imposed stricter rules for third-party apps on Thursday, engineers and developers picked up their pitchforks and took to Twitter and blogs to decry what some likened to a "bait and switch."

byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and NICK BILTON

headline.main: Twitter Changes Lead to Online Protests
